alert.note: Alert for Coshocton; Muskingum (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 20 at 5:58PM EDT until August 20 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Coshocton County in east central Ohio... Northwestern Muskingum County in east central Ohio... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 558 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Frazeysburg, or 12 miles north of Zanesville, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Coshocton, Dresden, Frazeysburg, Warsaw, Conesville, Nellie, Drake, Walhonding, Layland, Blissfield, New Guilford, and Cooperdale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
